title: Refined Power
description: A Satisfactory Mod that adds 30+ hand made buildings to produce power!

title: Smart! [On Hiatus]
description: The mod that does things other's can't!

title: Additional 300 Inventory Slots
description: This mod adds an extra 300 inventory slots for FREE!

title: Structural Solutions
description: Structural Solutions adds 300+ new buildable objects to Satisfactory.

title: Infinite Zoop
description: Upgrade your max Zoop count and Zoop in two dimensions!

title: Pak Utility Mod
description: Utility Mod, but compatible with other mods

title: Satisfactory Mod Loader
description: Mod loading and compatibility API for Satisfactory

title: Mk++
description: Add Mk.2, Mk.3 and Mk.4 for Assembler, Refinery, Foundry, Constructor, Smelter, Manufacturer...

title: Linear Motion
description: Elevators and More!

title: Efficiency Checker Mod
description: See if your production is underflowing! Now with a hand tool, too!

title: Ficsit Farming
description: Get your Fingers Dirty with the ficsit farming mod!

title: Storage Teleporter
description: Teleport your storage from one side of the map to the other

title: Modular Load Balancers
description: Modular buildable that can be snapped together to form load balancers of any size

title: Fluid Extras
description: Several new pipe junctions, alternate Mini Water Extractor, and new A.I. Packing machine.

title: PowerSuit
description: A powered Suit with an internal Inventory that allows Modules to modify the Bonuses the Suit provides.

title: Floor Hole Ceiling Logistics
description: Pass Conveyors, Pipes, Power and Hypertubes through Foundations and Ceilings.

title: ContentLib
description: Easily create or modify Items, Recipes, and more via JSON for any machine and any mod!

title: Teleporter
description: Teleport you from a teleporter to another one! Works in Multiplayer

title: PowerSuit Modules Base Mod
description: Expand your equipment options with a PowerSuit! Highly customizable and configurable.

title: Daisy Chain Smart Input Factory
description: Adds new machines that has 4 power connections and will only store the triple of resources needed by each production cycle.

title: Conveyor Wall Hole
description: Put a hole in the wall for conveyors wherever you want.

title: EasyCheat
description: A quick way to do some cheats.

title: Big Storage Tank and MegaPump
description: A Tier 7 Big Storage tank to store 25.000 Fluids and a Strong Pump.

title: MiniMap
description: Shows a minimap on your hud

title: Item Dispenser
description: A special storage container that can place stacks of items directly in your inventory.

title: Infinite Nudge
description: Nudge in smaller increments, scale, and rotate on any axis. Also nudge extractors!

title: Power Checker
description: Check if your fuses can blow!

title: Magic Machines
description: SANDBOX. A lot of Fluids, Solids and Energy Spawner and Sink.

title: PSM: Fresh from RnD
description: These special-purpose Modules are fresh from R&D, offering interesting solutions to interesting problems.

title: Area Actions
description: Do stuff that usually takes too long, with just a few clicks

title: Modpack: All PowerSuit Modules
description: Conveniently install the entire PowerSuit Modules collection of mods!

title: PSM: Mobility
description: Modules to help you move around on land, power line, tube, and more.

title: Container Screens and more
description: Automatically adds a customizable screen in all Containers showing whats inside. Now with buildable to see all other machines.

title: PSM: Flight
description: Modules that help you get up into the air and stay there!

title: PSM: Power Generation
description: Modules that produce vital Power for your other modules to operate with.

title: PSM: Suit Regulation
description: Modules that allow you to fine-tune the operation of your Suit's Power and Fuel systems.

title: Unlock All Alternate Recipes
description: CHEAT. Gives you everything that Hard Drives gives you: 70 Alternate Recipes + 10 Inventory Slots.

title: ExoSuit Mod
description: Adds an 'ExoSuit' which functions as the jetpack and blade runners

title: PSM: Pioneer Protection
description: Protect yourself from the environment (and your fellow Pioneers) with this line of Modules.

title: FICSIT Blueprints Extensions
description: Add 3 new Blueprint Designer Tiers to the game!

title: Advanced Logistics
description: Adds a ratio adjustable splitter and merger

title: Huge Storage
description: Huge Storage adds storage containers with more slots!

title: Flex Splines - Longer Belts
description: Allows you to build longer VANILLA Conveyors, Pipes, Tracks, Powerlines and Hypertubes. And more flexible modded builds.

title: FicsIt-Networks
description: Upgrade Satisfactory with customizable computers, smart networking and custom scripting for unparalleled factory control!

title: Faster Manual Crafting Redux
description: Are you tired of the early game crafting grind? Speed up your manual crafting!

title: Light It Up
description: A Satisfactory Mod which adds a couple of Lamps to the game.

title: PermaDay
description: A basic mod that makes your wonderful day last forever !

title: Upside Down Foundations More
description: Grass, emissives, rock, and more foundations and walls.

title: Throughput Counter and Limiter
description: Belt attachment that displays the actual item throughput per minute. Can optionally limit the IPM.

title: Micro Manage
description: TOOL: Visually Copy, Delete, Move, Rotate, & Resize selections of buildable objects in your factory

title: MoarFactory
description: MoarFactory is more Factory... Buildings, Walls, Stairs and many moar

title: X3-Roads
description: X3-Roads is a mod for creating flat and ramped roads. The mod comes with 100+ parts. WITH ZOOP

title: Item Spawner
description: Allows spawning of items in game via GUI for those creative only users

title: X3-Signs V2
description: X3-Signs is a mod for using different signs, which can be fully customized.

title: Covered Conveyor Belts
description: A variety of Covered Conveyor Belts Mk1-6! (+ coloured-belt standard conveyors Mk 1-6!)

title: Stack Overflow
description: Makes all items stack to 500 ! Or much, much more

title: Wall Pipe Supports
description: Additional variants of the wall pipe support

title: Circuitry - Logic gates and More
description: Allows you to create circuits to control your factory in any way you want

title: All Nodes Pure
description: ALL nodes of the world are pure.

title: Just Fly
description: Mod just for flying, focused on ergonomics

title: Resource Node Creator
description: You can create Resource Nodes with Power Shards

title: Inventory Slots 150
description: Get 150 more inventory slots.

title: Better BladeRunners
description: Run faster with this Blade Runner ! Working on Multiplayer

title: Faster Full Health Regeneration
description: With this mod you will regenerate the full health faster

title: Underground Belts
description: You could place as many "x" inputs for "1" output and vice versa.

title: RSS2 / Really Simple Signs
description: Adds a variety of signs for your factory. Fully MP compatible!

title: Additional 500 Inventory Slots
description: Gives you 500 Inventory Slots

title: Item Hopper
description: A special storage container that can extract items from your inventory.

title: Multi Splitter/MergerBalancer
description: You can merge, split or balance 12 Inputs/Outputs. It will not split equally.

title: Awesome Points x100
description: CHEAT. All Awesome Points you get on Resource Sink is multiplied by 100.

title: Cheap Power Shards
description: CHEAT. A Tier 2 very cheap recipe for you to produce your own Power Shards.

title: Crash Site Beacons
description: Places map markers at every crash site.

title: Huge Inventory ( +100 slots)
description: Add you 100 Inventory Slots [ MP SUPPORTED]

title: Fluid Sink and more
description: A Fluid Sink to vanish fluids, Valve Overflow, Ground Water Drill, Multi Pipe Junction and Mini Storage Tank.

title: Factory Props
description: Your Ultimate Decorating Toolkit!

title: Daisy Chain Everything
description: Increases the number of power connections on all buildings, both vanilla and modded

title: Production Stats
description: See production and consumption statistics.

title: Decoration
description: Environment items that you can place on your Factory.

title: Inventory Slots 50
description: Automatically gives you 50 more inventory slots.

title: Power Control Room
description: Some tools to deal with the power management.

title: Industrial Evolution
description: A feature-rich mod based on Mk++ and X3's Better Vehicles with many quality of life improvements

title: Fast Craft Bench
description: Very fast Craft Bench recipes for Tier 1 Items with 20% loss of materials.

title: Easy Hard Drives
description: If you don't wanna explore in this gameplay, just make your hard drives in your workbench.

title: SkyUI
description: Time Perception Configurator

title: X3 Better Vehicles & Drones
description: Better Vehicles is a mod with multiple type of vehicle and stations modified available in Tier 3

title: Super Chainsaw
description: Chop all of the things!

title: Hyper Boosters
description: Adds "Hyper Boosters", Hypertube entrances that boost you very fast

title: NoFog
description: Remove Fog from the game

title: Passive Mode
description: Removes all enemies and gas clouds from the game!

title: GameTime
description: Have the game time, system time and session time always on your screen.

title: More Decorations
description: More useless things for beautify your factory. Better with Micro Manage!

title: No Fall Damage
description: Dying while falling is frustrating, this mod removes all fall damage

title: Wall Conveyor Supports
description: Additional variants of the wall conveyor support

title: Belt and Miner (BAM)
description: add 6 belt and correspondant lift also some factory building

title: Programmable Elevators
description: Elevators that can jump between multiple floors

title: Road Tool
description: Build straight, curved, uphill or downhill streets easily with this tool.

title: Small Awesome Sink
description: Its a Small Awesome Sink Terminal with a belt input.
